name: Aimless (Grim)
description:
Trapped in a limbo-like space by powerful beings beyond their understanding, TK and Rena react in the only way they know how: with stubbornness and spite.

Kicking aside the definitions of "hero" pushed onto them, they strive to escape and, in the process, figure out what it is they're truly looking for.

Aimless is a short little adventure about figuring things out!

Credits:

Story+ Art - Grim

Music - @Sigh_Lee

Enjoy!
